resources.string:
Gudavalli Vijaya Krishna Sai 

 I am from Vijayawada, India. I am an exchange Student of Sapienza University of Rome enrolled as master student in Computer Science(Network and Security) and currently in mobility program USI,Lugano. 

 Previously, I worked as security research engineer in Netskope India pvt. ltd. at Bangalore. During that period I worked over different SaaS applications and different IDPs. 

 Rwiddhi Chakraborty. 

 I’m from India and background is in ECE and I’m a first year masters student in AI. I’m interested particularly in machine learning and deep learning in real world applications. I enjoy reading books and watching movies in my spare time. 

 Shubho 

 I am proficient in coding in Python and C++. I have no prior experience in Android development or Java, however I am perceptive and hope to use this course to get a solid start. 


In the past I have worked on Mobile Robotics algorithms (using ROS - Robot Operating System), Semantic Segmentation (Computer Vision), Game Development (using Unity).
